connect20/sexybookmarks_free_extension.name: connect20/SexyBookmarks_Free_extension

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/sexybookmarks_free_extension.description: Sexy Bookmarks adds a a modern beautiful menu under or above your catalog/products. This menu allows people to simply click to add your article to social bookmarking sites like Twitter, Facebook, Digg, Stumbleupon, LinkedIn, Google Mail, WordPress, and lots more! The pluginâ€™s settings panel has 33 different social bookmarking sites that can be selected on website.
